validation.message: Please see individual checks for details

checks.message: All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'info.data_category' field being populated with 'Sequencing Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: '.test_rg_3.bam'.
All files in the 'files' section of the metadata JSON are required to have 'dataType' field being populated with 'Submitted Reads'. File(s) found not conforming to this requirement: '.test_rg_3.bam'.
'fileName' must match expected pattern '^[A-Za-z0-9]{1}[A-Za-z0-9_\.\-]*\.(bam|fq\.gz|fastq\.gz|fq\.bz2|fastq\.bz2)$' in the 'files' section of the metadata, offending name(s): '.test_rg_3.bam'
SM in BAM header does not match submitterSampleId in metadata JSON: HCC1143 vs HCC1143T
